Accordion 1

It’s quick and easy! All you have to do is register and we’ll do the rest so you can start shopping for the things you love.

Did you know that having a homechoice account means you qualify for death, disability and retrenchment benefits? Well, now you do.

Register by clicking on ‘Login / Register’ and follow the steps provided OR contact our call centre on 0861 466 3240861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300+27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa) to speak to a friendly agent.

You’ll need the following:
  • Your ID number;
  • Address and contact details;
  • Employment details;
  • Monthly income and expenses.

Once you’ve registered, we will do a quick credit check to see if you qualify for a homechoice credit facility account. Credit regulations require you to confirm your income and expenses by sending us 1 month’s recent salary slips, bank statement or a completed proof of income form.
